data.message: Hi there, Someone has been watching my Notifications before I do for now at least three days. I changed my Password three times AND logged out of all devices, but this is still happening. Has someone hacked my account, or is it an error? I would like you to look into this. Thanks

replies.message: Hey, Minny. It's possible you may be experiencing a feature issue. The more detail you provide the better. Can you please report it at: http://on.fb.me/1Vx7llG. -Zack
